entries.journal_entry_description: You've found a strange tablet stuck in a lava rock. It depicts the location of what might be a hidden treasure!
entries.task00_message_box_text: There's a buried tablet stuck in the lava rock. You can only see the top half of what is written on it. From what you can make out, someone referring to themselves as a 'knight', explains that with recent developments, she's forced to hide something in the vault. The location of this vault is on the tablet, as well as the sequence needed to disable the security system. Unfortunately, that part is cut in half. You quickly copy down what is written on the plaque in to your datapad.
entries.task01_journal_entry_description: Could the location on the old tablet really be the vault with a treasure inside? You can't pass up the opportunity to find out.
entries.task02_message_box_text: There is indeed a vault here. The first thing to do according to the tablet is turning the left dial to the number 8.
entries.task03_journal_entry_description: The tablet has spoken the truth so far. You've found the old vault and started to try and crack the security system.
entries.task04_message_box_text: Click the saber symbol on the holocron.
entries.task06_message_box_text: That was all the help you got out of the tablet. There's two levers on the wall, which one to pull is up to you...
